title: The Thermostatic Voter: Why Local Policy Success Fails to Build National SupportRevision of apep\_0088. This version corrects two critical errors: (1) the original spatial RDD included Swiss national borders (France, Italy, Germany) in the running variable---this revision uses only internal canton-to-canton boundaries; (2) the original paper used simulated pre-treatment voting data---this revision uses actual historical referendum results from 2000, 2003, and 2016 fetched via the swissdd R package. (v2)
